task_background: Organize and prepare the donation center for efficient sorting and distribution of winter clothing.

tasks.task_description: Place the digital check-in tablet (check_in_tablet_1) on the sorting table 1 (sorting_table_1).
Place the handheld barcode scanner (barcode_scanner_1) in the storage room (storage_room).
Find the heaviest, metal sorting table and place the label printer (label_printer_1) on it.
Find the only red, plastic container and open it.
Use the glue dispenser (glue_dispenser_1) to fix the wobbly leg of the folding table (folding_table_1).
Use the wrench (wrench_1) to tighten the squeaky wheel of the rolling cart (rolling_cart_1).
Use the whisk (whisk_1) to whisk the coffee in the coffee pot (coffee_pot_1) and then place it on the folding table (folding_table_1).
Use the broom (broom_1) to sweep the sorting area (sorting_area) and then place the broom in the storage room (storage_room).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the locked supply cabinet (supply_cabinet_1) using the silver key (cabinet_key_1).
Move the industrial metal shelving (metal_shelving_1) to the sorting area (sorting_area).
Move the overloaded garment rack (garment_rack_1) to the storage room (storage_room).
Cooperatively move the heavy, rusted metal shelving (metal_shelving_1) to the sorting area (sorting_area) and use the wrench (wrench_1) to tighten any loose parts.
Cooperatively move the heavy, unstable garment rack (garment_rack_1) to the storage room (storage_room) and use the glue dispenser (glue_dispenser_1) to stabilize it.
